overview:
Ayokunle Bankole is the Chief Administrative Officer and co-founder of the new ScoopAfrica.com. The website is reputed to be Africa’s foremost individual and company profile database on the web; and famous for helping African companies and individuals to create, organize and market their profiles.

ScoopAfrica.com started out of the need to help young entrepreneurs get their offerings out to their target audience cost-effectively; as it was increasingly getting difficult and expensive for small business owners to advertise on the big stage.

Ayokunle is also the Chief Strategist at Loud Media Company, a consulting firm that specializes in Integrated Marketing Communications.

His passion for entrepreneurship knows no boundaries. He lives to help young entrepreneurs like himself grow to become business giants.
